election_record.label: Massachusetts 1799 House of Representatives, New Bedford

overview.note: "Monday last, the inhabitants of this town assembled to elect a representative for the state Legislature. - the whole number of votes given in was 177 - Seth Spooner, Esq. had 119, and is rechosen. - The other gentlemen voted for, are staunch Federalist." The Medley or Newbedford Marine Journal (New Bedford, MA). May 17, 1799.

election_record.reference: The Medley or Newbedford Marine Journal (New Bedford, MA). May 17, 1799.
